parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The application name. If you leave this parameter empty, all applications are matched.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   **asc** (default): ascending order
*   **desc**: descending order

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 5 to 30. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The stream name. If you leave this parameter empty, all streams are matched.
